attributes.action: The NHS will remain free for all UK residents forever & can't be privatised.
attributes.background: The NHS is an essential service in the UK and regularly would be the difference between life and death for many people. The Government must agree to introduce swift and watertight legislature that the NHS being privatised can never be consider by this or any future Government.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Revoke the Health and Social Care Act 2012 and renationalise the NHS 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300019
